City Council

  • Second Thursday of every month

The City Council is composed of the Mayor and 5 council members. The Mayor and Council members are all elected at large for two-year terms.

City of Hamilton Governing Body

Richard Buchanan: Mayor mayor@ci.hamilton.tx.us

Ronald Todd Jordan: Mayor Pro-Tem Doug Baker: Council Member Jacob Robertson: Council Member James Hooper: Council Member Danny Whitehead: Council Member

Hamilton City Hall 200 E Main St. Hamilton, TX 76531 City Administrator Email Address 254-386-8116 ext 6

City Council Seeking Applications:

City Council is currently seeking applications for an open city council position.  The position will fill an unexpired term through May, 2026. The applicant must be a resident of the City of Hamilton for the past 6 months.  Applications can be picked up at City Hall and downloaded from the City’s website, hamiltontexas.com. Applications are due August 8, 2025 at 5:30 p.m.

For more information, please contact the Hamilton City Secretary at 254-386-8116.
